author: sp

review: I have had chromecast for a year now and have concluded it is garbage.  I have gone through 2 different chromecast units during that time and both had the same problem.  They both seem to overheat and stop functioning properly. The only fix is to unplug them and wait a minute or two then plug them back in.  This is frequently required, at least 2-3 times a week.  Devices should not overheat so often.  No one would be happy with this happening to their car, computer or tv.  It's very frustrating.Also there are many tv apps that seem to be incompatible with chromecast.  if is not going to be supported by all tv apps then it's useless.
